title: Wicked
description: The sizzling new novel from a new star in the world of erotica.By day, Karl Dawson is a jaded divorce attorney. By night he's a restless "dominant" in underground sex clubs. A tough, whip-cracking challenge like Lara Fox is a fantasy come true. She's just as strong-willed, and just as unprepared for where their experiments in control will take them.
author: Sasha White
